title: Authors and Citation
text: Jonathan Millar. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Millar J (2023). ARDSMAICR: Analysis ARDS Genomics MAIC. R package version 0.1.1, https://jonathanemillar.github.io/ARDSMAICr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ARDSMAICR: Analysis of ARDS Genomics MAIC},   author = {Jonathan Millar},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.1},   url = {https://jonathanemillar.github.io/ARDSMAICr/}, }

title: Analysis of ARDS Genomics MAIC
text: ARDSMAICR package contains results meta-analysis information content (MAIC) whole-genome studies host response acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS). data accompanied range helper functions useful analysis.

title: Analysis of ARDS Genomics MAIC
text: MAIC developed Baillie Lab, Roslin Institute, University Edinburgh method combining lists genes arising diverse experimental sources. used study host response Influenza SARS-CoV-2. MAIC consistently performs similar algorithms case ranked unranked data sources presence heterogeneity quality studies. details can found . source code MAIC hosted .

title: Analysis of ARDS Genomics MAIC
text: can install latest version ARDSMAICR GitHub :

title: Analysis of ARDS Genomics MAIC
text: systematic review, data extraction, MAIC described detail study website. package contains output MAIC covering period 1st January 1967 1st December 2022. Future releases match regular updates systematic review. data contained data_genes. following format: Additional data : data_study. summary studies identified systematic review, including methods. data_contributions. Calculated study contributions MAIC. data_biolitmine. results BioLitMine search MeSH “Respiratory Distress Syndrome, Adult”. data_covidmaic. ranked list genes MAIC SARS-CoV-2 studies.

title: Analysis of ARDS Genomics MAIC
text: Several groups functions useful analysis MAIC results included. fall following broad families: Study summaries. MAIC summaries. MAIC genes. MAIC contributions. Functional enrichment. Gene overlap. majority functions can applied standard MAIC output analysis.

title: Count categories per gene — categories_per_gene
text: Returns number categories supporting unique gene SNP.

title: Count categories per gene — categories_per_gene
text: data_study Data frame format ARDSMAICR::data_study data_genes Data frame format ARDSMAICR::data_genes

title: Count categories per gene — categories_per_gene
text: tibble

title: Count categories per gene — categories_per_gene
text: Input columns data_study : id - Integer 1 n studies - dbl First_author - First author family name - chr Article_title - Article title - chr Year - Year publication - dbl Journal - Journal - chr DOI - Digital object identifier - dbl PMID - PubMed ID - dbl uID - Unique ID. Format First_Author Year PMID - chr Method - Study method e.g., "GWAS" - chr Technology - Technology used e.g., "Microarray" - chr Tissue - Tissue type sampled e.g., "BALF" - chr Cell - Cell type sampled e.g., "Neutrophils" - chr Focus Study focus e.g., "Susceptibility" - chr ARDS_pts - Total number patients ARDS included study - dbl ARDS_definition - Definition ARDS used study - chr List_available - gene list associated study retrievable - lgl Input columns data_genes (standard output MAIC algorithm): gene - HGNC gene symbol - chr 1... uID - Study unique identifier. Column contains study specific gene score - dbl n... maic_score - MAIC score gene - dbl contributors - Studies contributing MAIC score method - chr

Format First_Author Year PMID - chr Method - Study method e.g., "GWAS" - chr Technology - Technology used e.g., "Microarray" - chr Tissue - Tissue type sampled e.g., "BALF" - chr Cell - Cell type sampled e.g., "Neutrophils" - chr Focus Study focus e.g., "Susceptibility" - chr ARDS_pts - Total number patients ARDS included study - dbl ARDS_definition - Definition ARDS used study - chr List_available - gene list associated study retrievable - lgl Input columns data_genes (standard output MAIC algorithm): gene - HGNC gene symbol - chr 1... uID - Study unique identifier. title: Calculate study contributions — contributions_calculation
text: Calculates raw relative information contribution studies MAIC.

title: Calculate study contributions — contributions_calculation
text: data Data frame format ARDSMAICR::data_genes

title: Calculate study contributions — contributions_calculation
text: tibble

title: Calculate study contributions — contributions_calculation
text: Input columns data_genes (standard output MAIC algorithm): gene - HGNC gene symbol - chr 1... uID - Study unique identifier. Column contains study specific gene score - dbl n... maic_score - MAIC score gene - dbl contributors - Studies contributing MAIC score method - chr Definitions: raw_information = sum gene scores study relative_information = raw_information/sum gene scores MAIC raw_contribution = sum gene scores study contribute MAIC score relative_contribution = raw_contribution/sum gene scores MAIC contributing MAIC score

Sum gene scores study - dbl information - Information relative sum gene scores - dbl raw_contribution - Raw contribution. Sum gene scores study score contributes overall MAIC score - dbl contribution - Contribution relative sum scores - dbl Input columns data_study : id - Integer 1 n studies - dbl First_author - First author family name - chr Article_title - Article title - chr Year - Year publication - dbl Journal - Journal - chr DOI - Digital object identifier - dbl PMID - PubMed ID - dbl uID - Unique ID. Format First_Author Year PMID - chr Method - Study method e.g., "GWAS" - chr Technology - Technology used e.g., "Microarray" - chr Tissue - Tissue type sampled e.g., "BALF" - chr Cell - Cell type sampled e.g., "Neutrophils" - chr Focus Study focus e.g., "Susceptibility" - chr ARDS_pts - Total number patients ARDS included study - dbl ARDS_definition - Definition ARDS used study - chr List_available - gene list associated study retrievable - lgl

Count enriched pathways — gp_count_pathways
text: Returns total number enriched pathways number enriched pathways per database.

title: Count enriched pathways — gp_count_pathways
text: gp_result return object gp_enrichment() by_pathway Count pathway database -- Default = FALSE

title: Count enriched pathways — gp_count_pathways
text: Either integer tibble

title: Count enriched pathways — gp_count_pathways
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  gp_enrichment(ARDSMAICR::data_genes, p_threshold = 0.001, source = c("REAC", "WP")) |>  gp_count_pathways()  } }

title: Functional enrichment using gprofiler — gp_enrichment
text: Performs functional enrichment standard MAIC output range databases.

title: Functional enrichment using gprofiler — gp_enrichment
text: data Data frame format ARDSMAICR::data_genes p_threshold Threshold P value -- Default = 0.01 source Database -- combination GO, GO:MF, GO:CC, GO:BP, KEGG, REAC, WP, HPA -- Default = c("GO", "KEGG", "REAC", "WP", "HPA")

title: Functional enrichment using gprofiler — gp_enrichment
text: Enrichment result associated metadata

title: Functional enrichment using gprofiler — gp_enrichment
text: Input columns data_genes (standard output MAIC algorithm): gene - HGNC gene symbol - chr 1... uID - Study unique identifier. Column contains study specific gene score - dbl n... maic_score - MAIC score gene - dbl contributors - Studies contributing MAIC score method - chr Databases: GO = Gene Ontology (MF = molecular function; CC = cellular component, BP = biological process) KEGG = Kyoto Encyclopaedia Genes Genomes REAC = Reactome WP = WikiPathways HPA = Human Protein Atlas

title: Functional enrichment using gprofiler — gp_enrichment
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  gp_enrichment(ARDSMAICR::data_genes, p_threshold = 0.001, source = c("REAC", "WP"))  } }

title: Functional enrichment plot — gp_plot
text: Creates Manhattan plot functional enrichment results.

title: Functional enrichment plot — gp_plot
text: gp_result return object gp_enrichment() is_interactive Interactive plot -- Default = TRUE

title: Functional enrichment plot — gp_plot
text: Manhattan plot

title: Functional enrichment plot — gp_plot
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  gp_enrichment(ARDSMAICR::data_genes, p_threshold = 0.001, source = c("REAC", "WP")) |>  gp_plot(is_interactive = FALSE)  } }

title: Functional enrichment results table — gp_table
text: Creates interactive html table tidy output gprofiler.

title: Functional enrichment results table — gp_table
text: gp_tidy_result return object gp_tidy_results()

title: Functional enrichment results table — gp_table
text: html table

title: Functional enrichment results table — gp_table
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  gp_enrichment(ARDSMAICR::data_genes, p_threshold = 0.001, source = c("REAC", "WP")) |>  gp_tidy_results() |>  gp_table()  } }

title: Tidy functional enrichment results — gp_tidy_results
text: Returns tidy tibble gprofiler output.

title: Tidy functional enrichment results — gp_tidy_results
text: gp_result return object gp_enrichment()

title: Tidy functional enrichment results — gp_tidy_results
text: tibble

title: Tidy functional enrichment results — gp_tidy_results
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  gp_enrichment(ARDSMAICR::data_genes, p_threshold = 0.001, source = c("REAC", "WP")) |>  gp_tidy_results()  } }

title: Information adjacency matrix — inf_adj_matrix
text: Creates adjacency matrix shared information content/contribution studies.

title: Information adjacency matrix — inf_adj_matrix
code: inf_adj_matrix(data, contribution = FALSE, unique = TRUE, as_list = FALSE)

title: Information adjacency matrix — inf_adj_matrix
text: data Data frame format ARDSMAICR::data_genes contribution Return information contribution -- Default = FALSE unique Include information genes uniquely identified study -- Default = TRUE as_list Option return adjacency list -- Default = FALSE

title: Information adjacency matrix — inf_adj_matrix
text: matrix dimensions n studies x n studies. cells represent summed scores genes shared studies. Direction maintained, columns rows represents information column shared row. return may specified information content - gene scores regardless contribution MAIC score - information contribution - gene scores study contributes MAIC score gene. option include remove information content/contribution generated study uniquely available.

title: Information adjacency matrix — inf_adj_matrix
text: Input columns data_genes (standard output MAIC algorithm): gene - HGNC gene symbol - chr 1... uID - Study unique identifier. Column contains study specific gene score - dbl n... maic_score - MAIC score gene - dbl contributors - Studies contributing MAIC score method - chr

title: Information adjacency matrix — inf_adj_matrix
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  inf_agj_matrix(ARDSMAICR::data_genes, contribution = TRUE, unique = FALSE)  } }

text: Input columns data_study : id - Integer 1 n studies - dbl First_author - First author family name - chr Article_title - Article title - chr Year - Year publication - dbl Journal - Journal - chr DOI - Digital object identifier - dbl PMID - PubMed ID - dbl uID - Unique ID. Format First_Author Year PMID - chr Method - Study method e.g., "GWAS" - chr Technology - Technology used e.g., "Microarray" - chr Tissue - Tissue type sampled e.g., "BALF" - chr Cell - Cell type sampled e.g., "Neutrophils" - chr Focus Study focus e.g., "Susceptibility" - chr ARDS_pts - Total number patients ARDS included study - dbl ARDS_definition - Definition ARDS used study - chr List_available - gene list associated study retrievable - lgl Input columns data_genes (standard output MAIC algorithm): gene - HGNC gene symbol - chr 1... uID - Study unique identifier. Column contains study specific gene score - dbl n... maic_score - MAIC score gene - dbl contributors - Studies contributing MAIC score method - chr

title: MAIC overlap table — overlap_table
text: html table

title: MAIC overlap table — overlap_table
text: Primary use compare ARDS MAIC results BioLitMine search MeSH term "Respiratory Distress Syndrome, Adult". secondary use case compare ARDS MAIC MAIC analyses performed different conditions e.g., previous MAIC SARS-CoV-2 whole-genome studies. Input columns data_genes (standard output MAIC algorithm): gene - HGNC gene symbol - chr 1... uID - Study unique identifier. Column contains study specific gene score - dbl n... maic_score - MAIC score gene - dbl contributors - Studies contributing MAIC score method - chr

what: Compute hypergeometric test P value of gene overlap — overlap_test
title: Compute hypergeometric test P value of gene overlap — overlap_test
text: Compute hypergeometric test P value overlap MAIC genes (subset) user defined list genes P < user-defined threshold, significant overlap can assumed.

title: Compute hypergeometric test P value of gene overlap — overlap_test
Compute hypergeometric test P value of gene overlap — overlap_test
text: data_genes Data frame format ARDSMAICR::data_genes overlap_genes Data frame first column lists gene symbols n_data_genes Number MAIC genes include -- Default = "" -- chr universe Size gene universe. Either user defined integer "HGNC" = protein coding genes HGNC, "FANTOM_L" = genes expressed lung FANTOM5, "FANTOM_S" = genes expressed spleen FANTOM5 -- Default: "HGNC" -- chr

title: Compute hypergeometric test P value of gene overlap — overlap_test
text: Hypergeometric test P value

title: Compute hypergeometric test P value of gene overlap — overlap_test
text: Input columns data_genes (standard output MAIC algorithm): gene - HGNC gene symbol - chr 1... uID - Study unique identifier. Column contains study specific gene score - dbl n... maic_score - MAIC score gene - dbl contributors - Studies contributing MAIC score method - chr "HGNC" = protein coding genes HGNC = 19220 genes "FANTOM_L" = Genes expressed lung FANTOM5 = 12606 genes "FANTOM_S" = Genes expressed spleen FANTOM5 = 11512 genes

title: Compute hypergeometric test P value of gene overlap — overlap_test
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  overlap_test(ARDSMAICR::data_genes, ARDSMAICR::data_biolitlmine,    n_data_genes = 300, universe = "FANTOM_L")  } }
